entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow before morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
